items.title: Pitch opportunity: TechCrunch AI coverage
items.summary: Sarah Chen at TechCrunch is writing a piece on AI-powered marketing tools. High relevance match (92%) based on her recent coverage patterns. Recommend immediate outreach with our EVI methodology angle.

items.title: Content gap detected: AI citation optimization
items.summary: Competitor Clearbit published 3 pieces on AI citations this week. Your coverage is 0. SAGE recommends a pillar piece to capture emerging search intent.

gate.reason: AI content generation requires Pro plan

items.title: Keyword cluster optimization ready
items.summary: 14 keywords in the 'marketing automation' cluster have optimization opportunities. Estimated traffic uplift: +2,400 monthly visits. Auto-execution available.

items.title: Crisis signal: Negative sentiment spike
items.summary: Social listening detected 340% increase in negative mentions around 'data privacy'. 3 journalists have requested comment. Immediate response recommended.

items.title: Blog post optimization suggestions
items.summary: 5 existing posts could benefit from refreshed statistics and internal linking. Low effort, moderate SEO impact.

items.title: Ranking drop: 'marketing ops platform'
items.summary: Position dropped from #3 to #8 in past 7 days. Competitor HubSpot published new content targeting this term. Counter-strategy recommended.

items.title: Follow-up: VentureBeat interview
items.summary: Interview with VentureBeat scheduled for tomorrow. Prep materials generated. Review talking points and approve key messages.

items.title: AI model citation opportunity
items.summary: Claude and Perplexity are citing competitor content for 'EVI metrics'. Publishing authoritative content could capture these citations within 2-4 weeks.

gate.reason: AI citation tracking requires Enterprise plan
